pages.text: $(#630000)This is the item that got me here, all I had to do was Reach Inside it. I found it in a chest once night fell, but from what I've heard they stopped appearing past Phase 0. Most ignored the obviously suspicious letter, a turn of events which sort of defeated its purpose entirely.

$(#630000)Part of me knew I would die when I used it, but another part was fine with that.$(br)I don't plan on ever going back, nor do I want to. Technically, the Note was never supposed to preserve my faculties, but I've worked hard to prove that wasn't a mistake.

$(#630000)Melodramatics aside, having a friend here would help to make things more interesting. After a bit of convincing, I have received permission to make my own copy of the Note, which can be used during any Evolution Phase.
$(#630000)I can give this to someone to bring them to my side. A Factory should be able to create one with just a Book, or an existing Trustworthy Note if necessary.
